DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to verify that the incidence rate of urinary tract infections after a routine outpatient cystoscopy is the same for non-sterile (clean) and sterile procedural techniques.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Sterilization Technique on Incidence of Urinary Tract Infection After Cystoscopy
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age or older Patients undergoing routine outpatient flexible cystoscopy Patients who have had a urinary tract infection within 3 months prior to flexible cystoscopy Patients with an indwelling catheter
